title: TUI Blog Portfolio
description: A terminal-style portfolio and blog web application that looks and feels like a real terminal. Features 23 color themes, command-line navigation, admin mode with TUI editor, and a 3D floating window effect. Built with React, TypeScript, XState, and Express.js with JSON file storage.

title: Taildown Markup Language
description: A revolutionary markup language that extends Markdown with plain English styling, interactive components, and zero-config interactivity. Write beautiful, responsive web applications using natural language while maintaining perfect readability. Includes a browser-based live editor.

title: SCADA Command - Utility Operations Platform
description: Enterprise-grade SCADA HMI replacement platform designed for a muncipal utility. Replaces 20+ fragmented legacy HMI screens with a unified, intelligent web-based interface for real-time industrial monitoring and control. Built for zero hardcoded configurations - 100% dynamically configurable.

title: RouterOS Network Monitoring Portal
description: A modern, responsive network monitoring and configuration dashboard for RouterOS devices using REST API integration with comprehensive HTTPS security implementation and enterprise-grade admin user management. Acts as central network monitoring and command point for many remote sites and equipment. Full browser SSH integration with multi-session management, full monitoring and logging of all devices.

title: Deployment Command Center
description: Enterprise-grade deployment management CLI for multi-project environments with support for multi-environment workflows, automated server provisioning, and integrated monitoring dashboards. Features a beautiful React-based terminal UI with 7 different views.

title: Municipal Outage Management Suite
description: An enterprise-grade system for real-time utility outage tracking and response coordination. Streamlines emergency response with interactive mapping and crew management capabilities, featuring an advanced feedback system for continuous service improvement.

title: AI-Powered PDF Scanner App
description: A sophisticated document processing solution that combines cutting-edge AI technology with a modern UI to streamline invoice management and requisition form generation. Leverages machine learning for intelligent document analysis with 90% reduction in processing time.

title: Bible RAG System (Scriptura)
description: A comprehensive vector-embedded Bible database with AI-powered Retrieval-Augmented Generation capabilities for intelligent Bible study. Features semantic search, Strong's concordance integration, cross-reference analysis, and thematic analysis with 31K+ verses and 1800+ biblical themes.

title: BONERBOTS AI Trading Arena
description: A 24/7 autonomous AI trading simulation where multiple AI bots with unique personalities compete to maximize profits in cryptocurrency markets. Tests whether LLMs with specific personalities and strategies can consistently outperform the market.

title: Vehicle Management Suite
description: A comprehensive, professional web application for complete vehicle fleet management, combining condition reports, document management, maintenance tracking, and full vehicle lifecycle administration. Enterprise-grade with mobile-optimized responsive design.

title: GrokMap - AI Chat Mindmap Visualization
description: An interactive AI chat visualization dashboard that creates mindmaps from chat histories. Features streaming chat with Grok-2 and transforms conversations into explorable 3D mindmap structures with branching connections.

title: Agricultural Operations Platform
description: A modern farm management solution that streamlines agricultural operations through intuitive field tracking, expense management, and inventory control systems. Features real-time metrics dashboard and role-based access control.
